sentences.english: The Laba Festival, the day in most parts of China have the custom of eating Laba porridge.
sentences.chinese: 腊八节这天我国大多数地区都有吃腊八粥的习俗。

sentences.english: The date of the Laba Festival usually falls in mid-January.
sentences.chinese: 腊八节的阳历日期通常在1月中旬。

sentences.english: Laba Festival there are two legendary origin.
sentences.chinese: 腊八节的由来有两个传说。

definition: Laba congee, ceremonial rice porridge dish eaten on the 8th day of the 12th month in the Chinese calendar
